text: The horned grebe or Slavonian grebe (Podiceps auritus) - Podiceps: Latin for podicis (rump) and pedis (foot), referring to the placement of the legs on its body; auritus: Latin for eared - is a member of the grebe family of water birds. It inhabits Eurasia and North America.Avibase - the world bird database ==References== Category:Birds of Asia Category:Birds of Europe Category:Birds of North America Category:Podicipediformes
title: Horned grebe
